text:
Participation in the DROP terminates when the Retirement Board approves a DROP participant's application for disability retirement and no DROP distribution shall be made. The DROP participant shall be paid an industrial disability retirement allowance as if he or she had never entered the DROP. 
(Added by Ord. 93-08, File No. 080464, App. 5/23/2008)

heading.catch_text: DISABILITY RETIREMENT ALLOWANCE GRANTED DURING DROP PARTICIPATION.
